name: Fallen Kingdom Snapshot 1.1
description:
BE THE HERO YOU ALWAYS WANTED TO BE!

Save Your Land From The Evil Demon "Orceus"! You are born as the chosen one in the prophesy which is discovered by the ancient wizards of your Land... Explore the Depths of the Darkest Forests, The Burning Valley Surrounding the Volcano, The Freezing Snowy Peaks, Fresh Grassy Plains, Highest Mountains, The Deep Dark Cornors of the Underworld, Dungeons AND MANY MORE! Are You strong enough to Defeat the Evil Gaurding your kingdom from it's freedom? This is YOUR LEGACY! BE PREPARED YOUNG WARRIOR!

Credits :-
